Text: Kennedy Oil Deal Discrepancies Cc There is a volume discrepancy for deal YK as reported in Sitara and TAGG Please take a look at this deal Also is anybody working on a special contract for this deal as it is a year deal attached to a GTC Thanks for your help Ann Ext
Select Energy Inc Deal Cc Debra Per your request please find attached Ann

GISB Base Contract Phillips Petroleum Company Cc Debra Please disregard the email I just sent you on Phillips Gas Marketing Company The GISB we need to amend is with Phillips Petroleum Company The counterparty called back and drew to my attention that we incorrectly booked our deals under Phillips Gas Marketing Company The deals should have been booked under Phillips Petroleum Company and I have communicated same to the Trader Details for Phillips Petroleum Company are as follows Contact Janice White Contract Email Phone Fax If you notice all the contact information stays the same except for the contract number Thanks Ann

GISB Amendment Phillips Gas Marketing Company Cc Debra Janice White of the above referenced company has agreed to have the GISB we have with them amended to designate Enron North America Corp as the confirming party Details are as follows Contract Email Phone Fax Let me know if there is anything I can do on my end Thanks Ann

Public Service Electric and Gas Company GISB Base Contract Amendment Cc Debra Regarding the above refenced GISB amendment which I brought up to you this morning ie the amendment with insufficient legal language here is the contact information Shary Walsh Mckay Contract Manager Email sharynwalsh SEGcom Phone Fax I also heard from Kim Gentle of Avista Energy Inc this morning They are the ones who sent back the amendment with the signature line missing She said she had talked with you and you were going to mail her an executed amendment for her to sign but she has not yet received it She said the signature line seems to get cut off when the amendment is sent to her electronically Her phone is and email address is

GISB Amendment Xcel Energy Inc Cc Debra Alan Bransgrove of the above referenced company has agreed to have the GISB Base Contract we have with them amended to designate ENA as the confirming party Details are as follows Contract Email Phone Fax I will be glad to email Mr Bransgrove the amendment when it is ready Thanks Ann

RE WilliamsThanks for the info Original Message From Perlingiere Debra Sent Thursday October PM To Osire Ann Wallumrod Ellen Dickson Stacy E Subject Williams My contacts are Tim Neuman credit dept and Kelly Knowlton senior ng analyst Debra Perlingiere Enron North America Legal Smith Street EB Houston Texas Fax

GISB Amendment AVISTA ENERGY INC Cc Debra Can you please forward me your contact at the above referenced company I need to follow up with them on the amendment Also I left a faxed executed copy of the amendment from Laurens Commission of Public Works on your desk this morning Thanks Ann

RE GISB Amendment Mitchell Gas Services LPDebra Thanks for all your efforts Original Message From Perlingiere Debra Sent Thursday October AM To Osire Ann Cc Dickson Stacy E Wallumrod Ellen Subject RE GISB Amendment Mitchell Gas Services LP In response to your email here is the Amendment for Mitchell Please forward to your contact Regarding Avista I have not received the amendment to date File Mitchell Gas GISB Amenddoc Original Message From Osire Ann Sent Wednesday October PM To Perlingiere Debra Cc Dickson Stacy E Wallumrod Ellen Osire Ann Subject GISB Amendment Mitchell Gas Services LP Debra Kim Clausen has agreed on behalf of the above referenced company to have the GISB contract amended to designate ENA as confirming party Details are as follows Contract Email Phone Fax Please if possible give this amendment priority It is one of the major problem counterparties we discussed in the meeting Let me know if there is any way I can assist Thanks Ann

GISB Amendment Mitchell Gas Services LP Cc Ms Clausen Attached for your review and signature is an amendment to the current GISB Base Contract between Enron North America Corp and Mitchell Gas Services LP The amendment restates Section to designate Enron North America as the confirming party for all transactions If in agreement please print and have two originals executed and forward same to Debra Perlingieres attention at Enron North America Corp Legal Department EB Smith Street Houston TX Also kindly fax a copy of same to my attentions at fax Upon final execution of the amendment by Enron North America Corp Debra will forward an original for your records Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions regarding the attached Thanks Ann

GISB Amendment Mitchell Gas Services LP Cc Debra Kim Clausen has agreed on behalf of the above referenced company to have the GISB contract amended to designate ENA as confirming party Details are as follows Contract Email Phone Fax Please if possible give this amendment priority It is one of the major problem counterparties we discussed in the meeting Let me know if there is any way I can assist Thanks Ann

GISB Amendment Xcel Energy Inc Cc Mr Bransgrove Please find attached the abovereferenced amendment that restates Section and in so doing designates Enron North America as the confirming party If in agreement please print and have two originals executed and forward same to Debra Perlingieres attention at Enron North America Corp Legal Department EB Smith Street Houston TX Also kindly fax a copy of same to my attentions at fax Upon final execution of the amendment by Enron North America Corp Debra will forward an original for your records Please do not hesitate to call me should you have any questions regarding the attached Thanks Ann
Contacts for Texaco Natural Gas Inc Cc Carla Dent Confirmations and Contracts Admin Phone Carla Dents Supervisor is Donna Tomlin The address is Bagby Street Houston TX

Kennedy Oil Deal Discrepancies Cc There is a volume discrepancy for deal YK as reported in Sitara and TAGG Please take a look at this deal Also is anybody working on a special contract for this deal as it is a year deal attached to a GTC Thanks for your help Ann Ext

GISB Amendment for AVISTA ENERGY INC Cc Debra I sent a hard copy of the GISB amendment to Kimberly Gentle of the above referenced company She said they executed the amendment and sent it overnight to us on and it was signed by our mailroom on Oct She called to find out whether we have received it I asked her to fax me a copy of the executed GISB but she couldnt find her copy and thats why she wanted to make sure that we received our copy Please let me know because I need to get back to her Thanks Ann

GISB Amendment National Fuel Marketing Company Cc Debra Charlie Wojta of the above referenced company has agreed to have the GISB Base Contract we have with them amended to designate ENA as the confirming party Details are as follows Contract Email Phone Fax I will be glad to email Mr Wojta the amendment once it is ready Thanks Ann
